name: accentio-web
description: Elevando el nivel y la experiencia de la web

scripts.serve: cross-env-shell APP=%npm_package_name% "echo Starting server (Hot Reload): %npm_package_name%... && nodemon ./index.js
scripts.debug: cross-env-shell DEBUG=%npm_package_name%:* NODE_ENV=development npm run serve

author: Alvaro Gabriel Gomez Andazol
